name: chatter
description: Chatter is a fully responsive real-time chat application that enables users to communicate instantly with each other. It is built with a robust tech stack, including React.js and Tailwind CSS for the frontend, Node.js and Express.js for the backend, and Socket.io for real-time communication. It provides features like real-time messaging with image sharing capabilities in chats, online/offline user status, user authentication, and profile management.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend

author: Bhaskar Jha
